item.title: Episode 15: C#9 Source Generators with Jason Bock
item.description: In this episode, I was joined by Jason Bock to chat about the new C#9 source generators! Writing code that writes code! We covered a ton of content, covering Source Generators, the Compiler API, Syntax Trees, Semantic Models, Expression Trees, and much much more! Links from the show Jason’s Links Twitter Blog Github YouTube Jason’s books Metaprogramming in .NET Applied .NET Attributes CIL Programming: Under the Hood of .
